title: Toys and games market : market segmentation by value 2009
summary: Other was the market Name with the largest Market share in Toys , as of 2020 .
The Market share of Other made up 30.5 % of the total Market in Toys .
Infant/Pre-school_toys , second in this list , had roughly 16.2 % of all Swedish page views .
gold: This graph depicts the share of toy categories of the total market value in 2009.
Activity toys accounted for 15.1 percent of total toys and games market revenue .
